verses.text: Let God \w be|strong="H1732"\w* seen, \w and|strong="H1732"\w* let \w his|strong="H1732"\w* haters \w be|strong="H1732"\w* put \w to|strong="H1732"\w* flight; let those who are against \w him|strong="H1732"\w* \w be|strong="H1732"\w* turned back before \w him|strong="H1732"\w*.

Let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w like|strong="H6440"\w* smoke \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* driving wind; \w as|strong="H6440"\w* wax turning soft \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire, \w so|strong="H6965"\w* let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w come|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w an|strong="H6965"\w* end \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* power \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* let \w the|strong="H6440"\w* upright \w be|strong="H0430"\w* glad; let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H7563"\w* delight \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; let \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* full \w of|strong="H0430"\w* joy.

\w Make|strong="H8055"\w* songs \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w make|strong="H8055"\w* songs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* praise \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name; \w make|strong="H8055"\w* \w a|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w comes|strong="H6440"\w* through \w the|strong="H6440"\w* waste lands; \w his|strong="H6440"\w* name \w is|strong="H0430"\w* Jah; \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w A|strong="H6440"\w* father \w to|strong="H0430"\w* those \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w have|strong="H8034"\w* no father, \w a|strong="H6440"\w* judge \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* widows, \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* holy place.

Those \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* without friends, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* puts \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w families|strong="H0001"\w*; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* makes free those \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* chains; but those \w who|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* turned away \w from|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* given \w a|strong="H0430"\w* dry land.

\w O|strong="H1004"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H0389"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* \w people|strong="H3427"\w*, wandering \w through|strong="H0389"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* waste \w land|strong="H6707"\w*; (Selah.)

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* earth \w was|strong="H0430"\w* shaking \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens \w were|strong="H0430"\w* streaming, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w was|strong="H0430"\w* present; even Sinai itself \w was|strong="H0430"\w* \w moved|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, did freely send \w the|strong="H6440"\w* rain, giving strength \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* weariness \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* heritage.

Those whose resting-place \w was|strong="H0430"\w* there, even \w the|strong="H3559"\w* poor, \w were|strong="H0430"\w* comforted \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3559"\w* good things, \w O|strong="H0859"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3559"\w* Lord gives \w the|strong="H3559"\w* word; \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* number \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* women \w who|strong="H3427"\w* \w make|strong="H3559"\w* \w it|strong="H3559"\w* public.

Kings \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w armies|strong="H6635"\w* quickly go \w in|strong="H6635"\w* flight: \w and|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* women \w in|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* houses \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* division \w of|strong="H6635"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* goods.

\w Will|strong="H4428"\w* \w you|strong="H4428"\w* take \w your|strong="H4428"\w* rest among \w the|strong="H1004"\w* flocks? \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* wings \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H4428"\w* dove covered \w with|strong="H1004"\w* silver, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w its|strong="H5074"\w* feathers \w with|strong="H1004"\w* yellow gold.

\w When|strong="H0518"\w* \w the|strong="H0996"\w* Most High put \w the|strong="H0996"\w* kings \w to|strong="H3701"\w* flight, \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w was|strong="H3701"\w* \w as|strong="H3701"\w* white \w as|strong="H3701"\w* snow \w in|strong="H7901"\w* Salmon.

\w A|strong="H6566"\w* hill \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* hill \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan; \w a|strong="H6566"\w* hill \w with|strong="H4428"\w* high tops \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6566"\w* hill \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Bashan.

Why \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w you|strong="H2022"\w* looking \w with|strong="H0430"\w* envy, \w you|strong="H2022"\w* high \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0430"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* desired \w by|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w as|strong="H1316"\w* \w his|strong="H0430"\w* resting-place? truly, \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* make it \w his|strong="H0430"\w* house \w for|strong="H0430"\w* ever.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* war-carriage \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* Israel's thousands; \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* come \w from|strong="H3068"\w* Sinai \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* holy place.

You \w have|strong="H0430"\w* gone up \w on|strong="H0430"\w* high, taking \w your|strong="H0430"\w* prisoners \w with|strong="H0430"\w* you; you \w have|strong="H0430"\w* taken offerings \w from|strong="H0430"\w* men; \w the|strong="H0430"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* taken \w his|strong="H0430"\w* \w place|strong="H6944"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0430"\w* seat \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H0430"\w* power.

Praise \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3050"\w*, \w who|strong="H0120"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* support day \w by|strong="H0430"\w* day, \w even|strong="H0637"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* salvation. (Selah.)

\w Our|strong="H1288"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3117"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*; \w his|strong="H1288"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* ways out \w of|strong="H3117"\w* death.

\w The|strong="H3069"\w* heads \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* haters \w of|strong="H0410"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w will|strong="H0136"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* crushed; even \w the|strong="H3069"\w* head \w of|strong="H0410"\w* him \w who|strong="H0410"\w* still goes \w on|strong="H4194"\w* \w in|strong="H0410"\w* his evil ways.

\w The|strong="H1980"\w* Lord said, \w I|strong="H0389"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* make them \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w back|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* Bashan, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* deep parts \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* sea;

\w So|strong="H7725"\w* \w that|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* foot \w may|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H0136"\w* red \w with|strong="H7725"\w* blood, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* tongues \w of|strong="H0559"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* dogs \w with|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* same.

We see \w your|strong="H4480"\w* going, O God: even \w the|strong="H4480"\w* going \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* God, \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w King|strong="H4616"\w*, \w into|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* holy place.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* makers \w of|strong="H4428"\w* songs go \w before|strong="H0430"\w*, \w the|strong="H7200"\w* players \w of|strong="H4428"\w* music come after, among \w the|strong="H7200"\w* young girls playing \w on|strong="H7200"\w* brass instruments.

Give praise \w to|strong="H7891"\w* God \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* great meeting; even \w the|strong="H0310"\w* Lord, \w you|strong="H0310"\w* \w who|strong="H5959"\w* \w come|strong="H6923"\w* \w from|strong="H8432"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H8432"\w* Israel.

\w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* little Benjamin ruling \w them|strong="H1288"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* chiefs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Judah \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* army, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w rulers|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Zebulun \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w rulers|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Naphtali.

O God, send \w out|strong="H8033"\w* \w your|strong="H8033"\w* strength; \w the|strong="H8033"\w* strength, O God, \w with|strong="H8033"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* you \w have|strong="H3063"\w* done great things \w for|strong="H8033"\w* us,
\w Out|strong="H6466"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H6680"\w* Temple \w in|strong="H0430"\w* Jerusalem.

Say sharp words \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beast \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* water-plants, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* band \w of|strong="H4428"\w* strong ones, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lords \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples, put \w an|strong="H5921"\w* end \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people whose delight \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* war.

Kings \w will|strong="H5695"\w* \w give|strong="H2416"\w* \w you|strong="H5971"\w* offerings, \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5695"\w* come out \w of|strong="H5712"\w* Egypt; \w from|strong="H3701"\w* Pathros \w will|strong="H5695"\w* come offerings \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*; Ethiopia \w will|strong="H5695"\w* \w be|strong="H5712"\w* stretching out her hands \w to|strong="H3701"\w* \w God|strong="H0967"\w*.

\w Make|strong="H3027"\w* songs \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w you|strong="H4480"\w* kingdoms \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* earth; \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* songs \w of|strong="H0430"\w* praise \w to|strong="H4714"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* Lord; (Selah.)

\w To|strong="H0430"\w* \w him|strong="H0430"\w* \w who|strong="H0430"\w* goes \w or|strong="H4467"\w* \w the|strong="H0776"\w* clouds \w of|strong="H0776"\w* heaven, \w the|strong="H0776"\w* heaven which \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* earliest times; \w he|strong="H0430"\w* sends out \w his|strong="H0430"\w* voice \w of|strong="H0776"\w* power.

\w Make|strong="H5414"\w* clear \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* God's: \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w over|strong="H5414"\w* \w Israel|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* clouds.

\w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3478"\w* feared \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* holy \w place|strong="H5414"\w*: \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w gives|strong="H5414"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w power|strong="H5797"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* people. Praise \w be|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
